header_text: You are on a weekend walking trip with a friend. When you reach a slight incline, you start to breathe heavily. You are scared about what this could mean for your health, especially given that you are out in the wilderness.

elements.text: You take a few deep breaths. Paying attention to what it feels like to breathe in and out helps to focus your mind, and you decide to...
